title: Optimal Mining
description: We will work out how to compare going to various cells containing halite and determine which is the optimal one to go to. NOTE: update July 3, 2020:  This new notebook does the calculation including carried halite by ships:  https://www.kaggle.com/solverworld/optimal-mining-with-carried-halite
